Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Cosmas, Damian, their brothers, and their mother:

Text.Language: <ere nwten w~ nimarturoc: ,ere niswij n~genneoc: ,ere niaylovoroc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Hail to the martyrs: Hail to the courageous heroes: Hail to the struggle-mantled: Cosmas, his brothers and their mother.
السلام لكما ايها الشهيدان. السلام للشجاعين البطلين. السلام للابس الجهاد. قزمان ودميان واخوتهما وامهم.
